structure.unit: Regulation Of Trade And Certain Enterprises

law.catch_line: Sale Or Distribution Of Plaintiff Personal Injury Listing; Required Information

text.section: No plaintiff personal injury listing may be sold or otherwise distributed by a listing service unless it includes a clear and accurate statement of the following information as to each matter listed therein:â€”
the names and addresses of the parties;
the claim of the plaintiff; and

the current status or disposition of the matter so listed including, when applicable, whether the matter has gone to a hearing or trial, whether the trier of fact has found the defendant liable, the amount of the settlement or award to plaintiff, if any, and the terms of the settlement or award.
